item.title: Ring brings its ‘Search Party’ feature for finding lost dogs to non-Ring camera owners
item.description: Ring's Search Party feature for finding lost dogs is now available across the U.S. — even if you don't own a Ring camera.

item.title: Carbon Robotics built an AI model that detects and identifies plants
item.description: Carbon Robotics' Large Plant Model will allow farmers to kill new types of weeds without having to retrain the machines.

item.title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
item.description: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, rais...

item.title: UpScrolled’s founder says the social network has zoomed past 2.5M users
item.description: Upscrolled founder said that the social network was launched six years ago and had 150,000 users until January

item.title: Linq raises $20M to enable AI assistants to live within messaging apps
item.description: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS and SMS.
